properties.name: sandbox.template-repository-path
properties.description: Path to the local clone of https://github.com/neo4j-graph-examples/template/ where the initial code samples live.

properties.name: sandbox.batch.repositories
properties.description: List of sandbox repository URIs to run code sample updates against. The repositories are typically in https://github.com/neo4j-graph-examples. Only HTTPS and SSH URI forms are supported.

properties.name: sandbox.github.address
properties.description: Base URL of the Github API, typically https://api.github.com.

properties.name: sandbox.github.username
properties.description: Github account needed to open pull requests against the configured sandbox repositories (see sandbox.updater.repositories property).

properties.name: sandbox.github.token
properties.description: Github access token of the configured Github account (see sandbox.github.username) needed to open pull requests against the configured sandbox repositories (see sandbox.updater.repositories property).
